data.title: Who is Hugh Grant’s wife Anna Eberstein and do they have children?
data.meta_description: ANNA Eberstein welcomed her third child with Hugh Grant in March 2018 – just a couple of months before the pair tied the knot.But where is she from
data.text:
ANNA Eberstein welcomed her third child with Hugh Grant in March 2018 – just a couple of months before the pair tied the knot.

But where is she from and what does she do for a job? Here's all you need to know...

Who is Anna Eberstein and what does she do?

Anna Eberstein is a 41-year-old television producer and retail director from Sweden.

She has gained media attention due to her relationship with British actor Hugh Grant.

Anna is the co-founder of Ace Slippers, a London-based Scandinavian sock company that specialises in traditional Swedish slipper socks.

It is not known how Hugh and Anna first crossed paths and found love.

When did Hugh Grant marry Anna Eberstein?

On May 25, The Sun exclusively revealed that Anna and Hugh had tied the knot.

They swapped vows in a low-key ceremony at Chelsea register office near their £10million West London home.

The couple then posed for photos with family and friends — wearing their wedding rings for the first time.

Clad in a navy lounge suit and tie, dad-of-five Hugh chose an unusual gold ring set with three red gemstones.

It bore a striking resemblance to a comedy ring used in his 1994 screen hit Four Weddings.

Anna shunned a traditional wedding dress in favour of a miniskirt and fitted blouse, but wore a classic gold band on her finger.

An onlooker said: "It looked like a small affair, just a few friends and family."

How many children do Anna and Hugh Grant have?

The loved-up couple have three children together.

Anna and Hugh welcomed their first child John Mungo Grant in September 2012.

Anna then gave birth to a daughter - whose name remains unknown - in December 2015.

In March 2018, Hugh's ex-girlfriend Liz Hurley revealed that the couple had welcomed their third child.

Appearing on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen, Liz was asked if she was surprised by the number of kids Hugh has had.

She replied: "He had another one last week. He has five."

The television producer had debuted her pregnancy bump during a rare public appearance at the 2018 Golden Globe Awards.

Her mother had reportedly told a Swedish publication: "I'm very happy to be getting another grandchild. She's due rather soon."

Hugh also has two other children - Tabitha and Felix - with receptionist Tinglan Hong.

How old is Hugh Grant and what are his biggest movies?

Hugh Grant is a 60-year-old award-winning actor and film producer.

He was born in Hammersmith, London and, in 1979, he won the Galsworthy scholarship to New College, Oxford - where he starred in his first film, Privileged, produced by the Oxford University Film Foundation.

He is well-known for playing lead roles in comedies - especially British romcoms.
